Моя любимая игра, Portal, хоть я и маленький 10-летний пиздюк, но у меня есть какой-то вкус в играх, когда мой брат купил Orange Box, мне было где-то 4 или 3 лет, я увидел Портал, через года 2, я поиграл в первую часть, это было незабываемо, Я ДАЖЕ С ПРИЁМНИКАМИ ДОСТИЖЕНИЕ ВЫПОЛНИЛ, Мне попросту нечего было там делать, потом мне брат сказал то-что есть вторая часть на консоле XBOX 360, брат скачал туда портал, я через время его прошёл, и второй портал для меня был интереснее, потом на ПК купил портал, перепрошёл (походу) и начал проходить совместку, потом я в прошлом году купил на этот аккаунт. Но есть минус, Half-Life Alyx Гейб выпустил, а хотя-бы DLC НЕТ. Так что этой игре спасибо за эмоции, и ставлю 11/10

Great puzzle gaming, awesome concept, guaranteed fun!

I'd recommend this game to anyone that wants to both try their brain at some satisfying puzzles, while at the same time having a fun, relaxing game session. It's a difficult balance, but Portal 2 pulls it off. The story, coop, community test rooms, and challenge mode have all impressed me greatly. There's very little I dislike about the game. Sometimes the game can be too dark and I know this is what was intended, but during different parts of the game you can easily find yourself stumbling to your death or unable to find where to shoot your portal next. Overall, fantastic game with little to no complaints.
Another classic from Valve. If you don't own this game, what are you doing with your life?
worth the money with over 5 hours of playtime

If you haven't played portal 2 or even the first game, go do yourself a favour and PLAY THEM. Trust me its a classic value game. The story improves by tenfold, way better then the first game in the right ways, the characters have a good store ark and the end that i will not spoil hits right in the feels. The game itself with the puzzles and its famous portal mechanics are absolutely fun and addicting but after your second play though of the story its easier and shorter then before. This doesn't mean that it is bad because the game has a map maker and co-op mode that you can play with buddy. Portal has a workshop for the map maker and even fan-made games that shows how big the community is. I highly recommend get this game and giving it a go.

This game is great!

i love this game so much :D 
the campaign is really nice, wheatley and glados are both amazing characters! the game is slightly challenging but satisfying to beat. 
multiplayer is where i spend most of my time (it is at least 30h of my playtime). ive beaten the game with 2 different friends so far and i plan on doing it at least 3 more times :) it never gets boring to me, i love joking around with my buddies and yelling at eachother for doing something wrong. ngl coop mode is like uno but you stay friends after [i] most of the time [/i]
I enjoy the puzzles and the quirks of the characters

Ein sehr gutes Spiel. Nicht um sonst von so vielen gefeiert. Schon witzig, dass in der ganzen KommPuter!-Spielgeschichte, ausgerechnet 2 sadistische Roboter, ein Paar der besten und unterhaltsamsten Charaktere  sind^^
ABSOLUTLY AMAZING SUPER FUNNY DIALOG AS WELL

Con el primero me interese mucho en los puzles y en la trama detrás de Aperture science, en el dos te engancha mucho más con los giros en la trama desde comenzar a entender lo que ha pasado con el mundo y tener esos momentos de amor/odio con GlaDOS que a pesar de todo seguirá siendo esa sarcástica que quiere verte muerta aunque la ayudes además de tener esos momentos cómicos que tiene ella y el pájaro. La jugabilidad es algo muy genial podrás entender las habilidades rápidamente la dinámica para usarlos, es mas de resolver puzles o planear como usarlo para avanzar, tiene muchas cosas extra para aprovechar mucho más el juego con estos niveles extras, además del modo cooperativo, tiene una historia increible con un villano super carismatico, los escenarios y los puzzles son exelentes no te vas arrepentir si lo compras. Ha sido una experiencia maravillosa haberlos jugado.
